entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
